item.title: Ilegal start of expression (HELP)
item.dc:creator: @smeego smeego
item.description:
@smeego wrote:

im trying to add some sort of anti-flood and im getting this error

server.java:312: illegal start of expression public int limitcount(String host) { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

the code im trying to add is …

public int limitcount(String host) { int numz = 0; for (String h : connections) { if (host.equals(h)) { numz++; } return numz; } }
any one any ideas how i can resolve this problem?

Read full topic
